docs.title: Welcome to CommitCrafter 🎨
docs.text: CommitCrafter is an AI-powered tool that makes writing commit messages a breeze. By analyzing your git changes, it generates meaningful, conventional commit messages so you can focus on what matters - coding.

docs.title: ✨ Key Features
docs.text:
• 🤖 Multiple AI Models
  • Choose from GPT, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, or Ollama
  • Each model brings its unique strengths

  • Switch models anytime with a simple flag

  • 🎯 Interactive Selection

  • Get multiple commit suggestions
  • Pick the one that fits best

  • Refined by conventional commit standards

  • 🚀 Developer Experience

  • Auto-copies to clipboard
  • Zero configuration needed
  • Works with any git repository
  • Conventional commits with emojis

Get Started View on GitHub

docs.title: Claude (Default Choice)
docs.text:
1. Create an account at Anthropic Console
  2. Generate your API key
  3. Set it in your environment: 
    export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY='your-key'

docs.title: Other Providers
docs.text:
OpenAI GPT 
export OPENAI_API_KEY='your-key'
Google Gemini 
export GEMINI_API_KEY='your-key'
Mistral 
export MISTRAL_API_KEY='your-key'
Ollama 
export OLLAMA_API_KEY='your-key'

docs.title: Commit Types Guide
docs.text:
CommitCrafter uses conventional commits with emojis:

Emoji Type Use Case ✨ feat New features 🐛 fix Bug fixes 📚 docs Documentation 💄 style Code style updates ♻️ refactor Code refactoring ⚡️ perf Performance 🧪 test Testing 🔧 chore Maintenance

Explore Models →

docs.title: Quick Start Guide 🚀
docs.text: Get up and running with CommitCrafter in minutes.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
# Using pipx (recommended)
pipx install commitcrafter

# Or using pip
pip install commitcrafter

docs.title: First Steps
docs.text:
1. Navigate to your git repository 

    cd your-project

  2. Make and stage some changes 

    # Make your changes
git add .

  3. Generate a commit message 

    commitcraft

  4. Select from the suggestions and you're done!

docs.title: Adding a Feature
docs.text:
$ git add src/auth.py
$ commitcraft
# Suggestions:
# 1. ✨ feat: add user authentication system
# 2. ✨ feat: implement basic auth functionality
# 3. ✨ feat: create authentication module

docs.title: Fixing a Bug
docs.text:
$ git add src/memory.py
$ commitcraft
# Suggestions:
# 1. 🐛 fix: resolve memory leak in data processing
# 2. 🐛 fix: prevent memory overflow in large datasets
# 3. 🐛 fix: address memory management issue

docs.title: AI Models Overview 🤖
docs.text: CommitCrafter supports multiple AI models, each with unique characteristics.

docs.title: Quick Comparison
docs.text: Model Best For Trade-offs Claude Overall quality Paid service GPT Fast responses Higher cost Gemini Free tier available Sometimes unstable Mistral Good value Newer service Ollama Privacy/Offline use Local setup needed

docs.title: Starting Out? Use Claude (Default)
docs.text:
• Excellent understanding of code
  • Consistent commit format
  • Good balance of features

docs.title: Need Privacy?
docs.text:
• Ollama runs completely locally
  • No data leaves your machine

docs.title: Enterprise Use?
docs.text:
• Claude or GPT recommended
  • Production-ready APIs
  • Enterprise support available
